description:
Learn the skills to troubleshoot and repair your Windows 10 PC. This course will give you the skills and techniques used by professionals to fix your own computer and save hundreds of dollars. I have been an IT professional for 5 years and have seen first hand how ridiculous the prices for computer services are. With that being said, I want to share my tips with you.

Valuable Skills

The skills you will learn are used by computer technicians everywhere. Companies like Best Buy (Geek Squad) charges $150 for services such as Virus Removal and that doesn't count the time spent just trying to find the issue. I will teach you skills they use and more.

You will never have to pay for those overpriced services again.

Content and Overview

This course takes an hour to complete and will cover the following:

  • Backup your PC
  • Speed up your PC
  • Reduce Boot Up Time
  • Speed up your Internet Browser (Firefox, Chrome, Edge)
  • Troubleshoot and Fix Audio Issues
  • Troubleshoot and Fix WiFi issues
  • Tune Up your PC
  • Find and Remove Viruses
  • Reset your PC to Factory Settings

You will see live demonstrations on the strategies to repair your machine.

The course is great for everyone but is geared toward the "Not-so-Tech Savvy" individual that wants to avoid paying hundreds of dollars for basic IT Support.
title: Windows 10: Troubleshoot & Repair Your PC in Minutes!
